curam.util.resources.impl
Class PropertiesResourceCache

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.resources.impl.PropertiesResourceCache

public final class PropertiesResourceCache
extends java.lang.Object

A cache for properties that are loaded from application resources. These are not the same as the application properties. Also the named resources can be accessed using this class.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static PropertiesResourceCache getInstance()
Gets the singleton instance of this properties cache.

Returns:
The properties cache.

getProperty

public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                    java.lang.String key,
                                    java.util.Locale locale)
                             throws AppException,
                                    InformationalException
Gets the value of a property. If there is no property for the given locale, the locale fall-back mechanism will be used. If there is still no property found, an exception will be thrown. Resources will be loaded if required.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the properties resource.
key - The property key.
locale - The required locale.
Returns:
The property value.
Throws:
AppException - If the property cannot be found. INFRASTRUCTURE.LOG_ID_RES_PROP_NOT_FOUND if the property key was not defined in the named properties resource for the given locale or any or the fall-back locales.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getProperty

public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                    java.lang.String key)
                             throws AppException,
                                    InformationalException
Gets the value of a property. If there is no property for the locale currently associated with the transaction, the locale fall-back mechanism will be used. If there is still no property found, an exception will be thrown. Resources will be loaded if required.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the properties resource.
key - The property key.
Returns:
The property value.
Throws:
AppException - If the property cannot be found. INFRASTRUCTURE.LOG_ID_RES_PROP_NOT_FOUND if the property key was not defined in the named properties resource for the given locale or any or the fall-back locales.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getProperties

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getProperties(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                                                      java.util.Locale locale)
                                                               throws AppException,
                                                                      InformationalException
Gets a map of all of the property names and their values from the given resource. If there is no resource for the given locale, the locale fall-back mechanism will be used. If there is still no resource found, the map of properties will not have any values. A new, unmodifiable map is created each time this method is called, so it is best not to call it if the PropertiesResourceCache.getProperty(String, String, Locale) method would be more appropriate. Only the get(Object) method on the returned map is supported and the key must be a string. Resources will be loaded if required.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the properties resource.
locale - The required locale.
Returns:
An unmodifiable map of the property names and value.
Throws:
AppException - If there is a problem loading resources.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

getProperties

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getProperties(java.lang.String resourceName)
                                                               throws AppException,
                                                                      InformationalException
Gets a map of all of the property names and their values from the given resource. If there is no resource for the locale currently associated with the transaction, the locale fall-back mechanism will be used. If there is still no resource found, the map of properties will not have any values. A new, unmodifiable map is created each time this method is called, so it is best not to call it if the PropertiesResourceCache.getProperty(String, String, Locale) method would be more appropriate. Only the get(Object) method on the returned map is supported and the key must be a string. Resources will be loaded if required.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the properties resource.
Returns:
An unmodifiable map of the property names and value.
Throws:
AppException - If there is a problem loading resources.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

hasProperties

public boolean hasProperties(java.lang.String resourceName,
                             java.util.Locale locale)
Indicates if any properties collection has been added for the given resource name and locale. This does not indicate that the collection contained any properties, only that a collection was added. This can be used to check if a properties resource has been cached, but it will not load that resource.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the resource. This is the name that was used when the properties were added.
locale - The required locale.
Returns:
true if properties were previously added (and not subsequently invalidated) for that name and locale, false otherwise.

getLastModified

public long getLastModified(java.lang.String resourceName,
                            java.util.Locale locale)
                     throws AppException,
                            InformationalException
Gets the last modified time of the most recently modified properties collection for the given resource name and locale. This is the latest modification time of all of the properties in the chain of fall-back locales starting at the given locale, or -1 if any or all of those properties maps do not specify a last modification time. Resources will be loaded if required.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the resource.
locale - The locale at which to start the calculation.
Returns:
The derived last modification time of all of the properties maps for the named resource and locale fall-back chain, or -1 if any resource has no modification time or of there is no such resource.
Throws:
AppException - If there is a problem loading resources.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

resetCache

public void resetCache()
Invalidates all properties in the cache. This will force them to be reloaded the next time they are requested.

resetCache

public void resetCache(java.lang.String resourceName)
Invalidates properties with the given resource name for all locales by removing them from the cache. This will force them to be reloaded the next time they are requested. If the name is null, the request will be ignored.

Parameters:
resourceName - The name of the resource.

getResource

public curam.util.internal.resources.struct.ResourceDetails getResource(java.lang.String name,
                                                                        java.util.Locale locale)
                                                                 throws AppException,
                                                                        InformationalException
Gets the named resource applicable for the given locale. If no resource is defined for that locale, a fall-back mechanism will be used to locate an appropriate resource. For example, if the locale is "en_US", but there is no matching resource for that locale, "en" will be checked next; if no matching resource is found, a resource assigned to no locale will be used; if no matching resource is found, an exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
name - The name of the resource. Must not be null.
locale - The locale for which the resource is required. If this is null, a resource with the given name that has no associated locale will be queried.
Returns:
The matching resource. The reported locale may not be as specific as the requested locale and may be null.
Throws:
AppException - If the resource cannot be found.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
